product_name: The North Face TKA 100 Microvelour Quarter-Zip Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Cozy up with The North Face TKA 100 Microvelour women's quarter-zip top and stay warm and comfortable during any activity without the bulkiness of thick layers. Upgraded Polartec(R) Classic 100 is perfect for cool weather layering; it provides warmth without the weight and bulk of traditional insulating fabrics. Unique microfibers provide an unparalleled softness, and UPF 30 protects skin from harmful UV light. Highly breathable to provide comfort in all activities; dries quickly to minimize heat loss; pill-resistant face/backing. Women's The North Face TKA 100 Microvelour quarter-zip top features a long, feminine, silhouette with a 1 in. drop to the rear hem. Closeout.
short_description: Cozy up with The North Face TKA 100 Microvelour women's quarter-zip top and stay warm and comfortable during any activity without the bulkiness of thick layers.
